summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WheelStat Order Tracking App - backend APIs and frontend UI integration testing successful with minor permission fix applied

fixed_issues.issue: Staff users could create orders when they should only be able to if they're admin or in 'received' department
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Added permission check in create_order endpoint

passed_tests: Order creation (rim and steering wheel types)
Department-based access control for staff users
Admin dashboard with all department columns visible
Completed orders page navigation and filtering
UI responsiveness and data-testid attributes present
